Am I Represented?, Website (2016)

One might argue that representative democracy can never really be democracy.

Nevertheless, we live inside a system where our elected officials are expected to represent their constituents. Surprisingly, I often found it difficult to simply find out who your representatives and senators were. There's so many different ways to search it and Google's results are inefficient. When big issues come up, I wanted to create a simple app that would get you immediately to a phone number and email.

http://amirepresented.com

All work subject to its obvious copyrights. All Starbucks work with due credit to the dream team of super talented friends I'm collaborating with on all of it.
